elements.name: require(bool,string)(! isFunded,MerkleDistributor: Distributor has already been funded.)

detectors.description:

	-require(bool,string)(! isFunded,MerkleDistributor: Distributor has already been funded.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#181)

detectors.description:
MerkleDistributor.isClaimed(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#152-158) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- claimedWordIndex = index / 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#153)
	- claimedBitIndex = index % 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#154)
	- mask = (1 << claimedBitIndex) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#156)
	- claimedWord & mask == mask (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#157)
detectors.markdown:
[MerkleDistributor.isClaimed(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#L152-L158) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [claimedWordIndex = index / 256](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#L153)
	- [claimedBitIndex = index % 256](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#L154)
	- [mask = (1 << claimedBitIndex)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#L156)
	- [claimedWord & mask == mask](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#L157)

detectors.description:
MerkleDistributor._setClaimed(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#160-164) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- claimedWordIndex = index / 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#161)
	- claimedBitIndex = index % 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#162)
	- claimedBitMap[claimedWordIndex] = claimedBitMap[claimedWordIndex] | (1 << claimedBitIndex) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#163)

detectors.description:
MerkleDistributor.constructor(address,bytes32,address,uint256).token_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#144) lacks a zero-check on :
		- token = token_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#145)

MerkleDistributor.constructor(address,bytes32,address,uint256).funder_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#144) lacks a zero-check on :
		- funder = funder_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#147)

	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(IERC20(token).transfer(account,amount),MerkleDistributor: Transfer failed.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__10.sol#175)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
